Method Detail

map

public static <K,V> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<V> map(List<K> fromList,
                                                                   com.google.common.base.Function<? super K,? extends V> function)
Given a function and a list, returns a list such that each element of the result is the corresponding element of the input list mapped through the input function. Unlike Lists.transform the result is not a lazy view, and null elements in the result are disallowed. This is very similar to the map function in Python and Scheme, except the parameters are reversed for consistency with Lists.transform.

Throws:
NullPointerException - if any of resulting elements would be null.

bundleMessages

public static com.google.transconsole.common.messages.MessageBundle bundleMessages(AlertSink alertSink,
                                                                                   List<ExtractedMessage> messages)
Build a MessageBundle from a List of ExtractedMessages.
